text: Olwashetaniyabaronelaebikholebiabu, mana nababoolela mbu; “Abulao ubashila nyanga yino, nasi endi halala ninenyu”, Ne olwa ekikanda chibili chabalwani chiabukanana , shetani nakalukha inyuma naboola mbu; “Esie shendi halala ninanyu tawe, esie endolanga kamulalolanga, esie ndaria Nyasaye, ne Nyasaye ni weshinyasio eshilulu.”
